nodes.bodyText: nit: feels like some commas are missing in this sentence :)
optional: While you are here, can you please change the code to not to swallow exceptions in tearDown?

while you are here :)
promVectorResponse is not closed
maybe we don't need @BeforeMethod here, but only @BeforeClass
squash this commit please with previous one.
It seems that it is squashed now.
Please make it @VisibleForTesting and please write few tests for it.
This is much more simple than ReportUnannotatedMethods and i do not think we need a test for it now.
And so it should be simple to add tests.
